```{r setup}
library(grid)
library(isocubes)
```

Isometric grids of points and lines can help "ground" a structure made from
isometric cubes.


```{r}
grid::grid.draw(isopointsGrob(pch = "+"))
```


```{r}
grid::grid.draw(isolinesGrob())
```


### Placing a voxel letter on a ground plane

```{r fig.width=5, fig.height=5}
grid::grid.newpage()
grid::grid.rect(gp = gpar(fill = 'lightblue'))
grid::grid.draw(isolinesGrob(col = 'darkblue', lty = 3, x = 0.35, y = 0.1))

grid::grid.draw(
  isocubesGrob(
    coords = isocubes::coords_letter, x = 0.35, y = 0.1
  )
)
```
